General.Name: Tuymazinskiy zavod avtobetonovozov OAO
General.Description: Tuimazinskiy Zavod Avtobetonovozov Publicly Traded Company designs and manufactures special purpose machinery for concrete. It offers inclined-axis mixers, autoconcrete pumps, booms, concrete mixers, linear concrete pumps, trailers, semi-trailers, trunk semi-trailers, semitrailer sorting trucks, sorting truck trailers, semi-trailer container trucks, semi-trailer metal trucks, stationary concrete pumps, fire-fighting foam lifters, and other products, as well as concrete mixer trucks with conveyor belts. The company also provides capacitive equipment, metal structures, and steel castings, as well as plasma cutting and metalworking services. In addition, it offers spare parts, additional equipment, accessories, and consumables for concrete mixers, concrete pumps, stationary concrete pumps, fire foam lifts, and cultivators. The company was formerly known as OAO Tuimazinskiy Zavod Avtobetonovozov and changed its name to Tuimazinskiy Zavod Avtobetonovozov Publicly Traded Company in November 2016. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Tuymazy, Russia. Tuimazinskiy Zavod Avtobetonovozov Publicly Traded Company is a subsidiary of KAMAZ Publicly Traded Company.
